video.title: Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic
video.synopsis: A land of mysterious ruins and a magical treasure hunt await young Aladdin and his courageous friend Alibaba for the adventure of their lives.

episodes.synopsis: Alibaba and Aladdin, who both long for adventure, become fast friends and set out to pursue their shared dream of finding long-buried treasure.
episodes.title: Aladdin and Alibaba

episodes.synopsis: Aladdin and Alibaba navigate a treacherous dungeon with help from the sacred spirit Ugo, who draws on Aladdin's energy and slowly saps his strength.
episodes.title: Dungeon Suite

episodes.synopsis: Aladdin and Alibaba make it to the inner chamber of the dungeon, only to face Morgiana, who is determined to kill Alibaba.
episodes.title: The Sorceror of Creation

episodes.synopsis: Alibaba uses the dungeon treasure to buy Morgiana's freedom, then sets off to find Aladdin, who's been taken in by the once-great Kouga clan.
episodes.title: People of the Plains

episodes.synopsis: Ryosai undermines Hakuei's peaceful mission to make the Kouga Empire a protectorate. Meanwhile, the Kouga Clan prepares for battle.
episodes.title: Dungeon-Capturer

episodes.synopsis: Morgiana's journey to Balbadd is almost at an end when thieves attack the caravan and a slave trader takes her captive.
episodes.title: Fanaris, the Warrior Tribe

episodes.synopsis: The kingdom of Balbadd long flourished as a center of trade, but it's prosperity is now threatened by a clan of thieves known as the Fog Troop.
episodes.title: His Name Is Sinbad

episodes.synopsis: Morgiana steps in when Alibaba turns his back on his friendship with Aladdin to focus on leadership of the Fog Troop.
episodes.title: A Promise That Can't Be Kept

episodes.synopsis: Alibaba tells Aladdin and Morgiana of how he came to forgive Cassim's treachery and join the Fog Troop in its fight against King Abhmad.
episodes.title: A Prince's Responsibility

episodes.synopsis: Alibaba pleads with Abhmad for the people's welfare, but the king ignores him as a mysterious priest named Judar arrives at the palace.
episodes.title: His Name is Judar

episodes.synopsis: As a battle begins between Aladdin and Judar, Ugo breaks free of Aladdin's control, and Kou princess Ren Kogykoku is drawn into the feud.
episodes.title: A New Visitor

episodes.synopsis: Sabhmad issues a grave warning to Alibaba, who turns to Sinbad for advice. If Alibaba doesn't assume the throne, Abhmad will enslave all of Balbadd.
episodes.title: Decisions and Farewells

episodes.synopsis: Alibaba reaches the palace grounds, where he's confronted by Abhmad's monkey army, but Morgiana fends them off until he can reach the throne room.
episodes.title: A Prince in Revolt

episodes.synopsis: Realizing the futility of convincing Abhmad to give up the throne, Alibaba announces that Balbadd will be a free republic.
episodes.title: Alibaba's Answer

episodes.synopsis: Cassim responds to the formation of the Balbadd republic by convincing the population that the royal family must be punished for their crimes.
episodes.title: Cassim's Answer

episodes.synopsis: Cassim, now transformed into a Dark Djinn, wreaks vengeance on the palace denizens. Meanwhile, Alibaba, injured in the attack, gets unexpected help.
episodes.title: Solomon's Wisdom

episodes.synopsis: Alibaba helps Aladdin restore Amon's damaged sword, then attempts to bring Cassim, who's been turned into a Dark Djinn, back to reality.
episodes.title: Smile

episodes.synopsis: An armada of ships from the Kou Empire nears Balbadd as Alibaba races to rebuild the city. But Sinbad, seeing a lost cause, urges him to flee.
episodes.title: Kingdom of Sindria

episodes.synopsis: As Aladdin and Alibaba train with two of Sinbad's Eight Generals, Princess Kogyoku arrives in Sindria to make a shocking accusation against Sinbad.
episodes.title: The Name of the Culprit is Sinbad

episodes.synopsis: Sinbad tells Hakuryu to seek knowledge of the outside world from Alibaba, who hears strange, ominous voices while in Hakuryu's presence.
episodes.title: The Two Princes

episodes.synopsis: Hakuryu joins Aladdin, Alibaba and Morgiana on his first dungeon-capturing quest. Along the way, Alibaba hears a disturbing voice inside his head.
episodes.title: The Dungeon Zagan

episodes.synopsis: Hakuryu allies himself with Alibaba, and they join forces with the other Magi to capture Zagan. But an unseen foe is about to challenge their quest.
episodes.title: Household of Flames

episodes.synopsis: Aladdin and Alibaba are left alone to confront Ythnan, Dunya and Isaac, whose powers grow as they summon dark forces during the battle.
episodes.title: Battle Cry

episodes.synopsis: The Kingdom of Sindria fends off an attack from Al-Thamen, as well as an ominous entity looming toward the battle and Dunya's Dark Djinn.
episodes.title: The Fall

episodes.synopsis: When Al-Tharmen's assault on Sindria proves to be a diversion, Alibaba is taken captive and only his friend Aladdin can guide him out of the darkness.
episodes.title: Alibaba and Aladdin
